bug.author: maziyarpanahi
bug.description:
Describe the bug The command flair.datasets.DANE() fails with 403 status code To Reproduce import flair.datasets
flair.datasets.DANE() Expected behavior It should download the Danish NER datasets in train, dev, and test.
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5762953/88786970-774aa600-d193-11ea-8ba7-88b37b0347ff.png></denchmark-link>
Environment (please complete the following information):
OS [e.g. iOS, Linux]: macOS Catalina Version [e.g. flair-0.3.2]: 0.5.1
Additional context

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/maziyarpanahi>@maziyarpanahi</denchmark-link> thanks for reporting this - I am getting the same error.

Thanks <denchmark-link:https://github.com/alanakbik>@alanakbik</denchmark-link> for the follow-up. I hope you don't mind me making a PR for this: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/flairNLP/flair/pull/1800>#1800</denchmark-link>
Will be fixed in the next release, thanks <denchmark-link:https://github.com/alanakbik>@alanakbik</denchmark-link> for merging the PR.
